text:
@replouiegohmert @seanhannity Please act like an adult & apologize for your recklessness
Let's review
1. You refused to wear a mask
2. You spread misinformation about #COVID19 
3. You exposed countless people
4. You mocked @RepJerryNadler 
5. You blamed the mask
6. You lied
7. You might die
#LouieGohmert https://t.co/8fRPGxIQKA
